messages.install:
Please visit http://www.beyondrealitypack.com/ for up to date information!

This pack is centered and semi balanced around Gregtech hardmode.

Gregtech changes many aspects of minecraft to increase the dificulty and extend the gameplay.

It also increases the load times substantially. Are you sure you wish to play?
messages.update:
UPGRADING Beyond Reality

You are going to upgrade an existing installation.

Use of /fml confirm may be required!

GregTech 5.09 Unofficial Experimental

Please consult Change Logs for up to date information!

This major update brings significant implementation changes in Gregtech and Framez mods.

While you can apply it to an existing world, keep in mind that most automations will need to be redone entirely.

Always backup your worlds!

warnings.warning:
Cauldron selected

When Selecting Cauldron, all extra Libraries will be injected into your server folder.

There might be more issues while running a cauldron based server, including but not limited too: Mods not supporting cauldron and Crashes that dont effect a normal forge server.

Please direct all support requests towards BeyondReality.

mod.name: Minecraft Forge
mod.description: Minecraft Forge is a modding API used by alot of mods.

mod.name: BiblioCraft
mod.description: BiblioCraft adds fancy storage containers including bookcases, armor stands, potion shelves, regular shelves, tool racks, glass weapon cases, wooden desks and wooden chest labels and now add machines, redstone interactions, and eyeware! New in 1.3: Fancy lamps and golden lanterns. Also Tables and enchanted plates!

mod.name: BiblioWoods Forestry Edition
mod.description: Adds support for 24 varietys of wood from Forestry for 8 of the wooden block in BiblioCraft.

mod.name: Carpenter's Blocks
mod.description: Adds slopes and a variety of vanilla-inspired blocks that support covers, side covers, overlays, dyes and chiseled patterns.

mod.name: Chisel
mod.description: A mod that adds in many fancy blocks for decoration, which are crafted utilising the Chisel.

mod.name: MalisisDoors
mod.description: Animated,Sliding and Custom doors!

mod.name: MrCrayfish's Furniture Mod
mod.description: This mod adds in what Minecraft has been missing for years, furniture! It includes over 40 pieces of furniture to decorate your bedroom, kitchen, living room and even your garden!

mod.name: Statues
mod.description: Adds player statues and showcases

mod.name: HelpFixer
mod.description: Fixes the help command from mod derpyness

mod.name: InpureCore
mod.description: Removes the clutter in NEI (IE 300 drums or 1000 multiblocks)

mod.name: Storage Drawers NEI Fix
mod.description: Fixes duplicate recipes in NEI caused by Storage Drawers NEI handler

mod.name: Dark Menagerie
mod.description: This mod was created basically on a whim and out of curiosity with Minecraft's handling of entities and their rendering.

mod.name: Ender Zoo
mod.description: Ender Io's Mobs and more

mod.name: Hardcore Ender Expansion
mod.description: Overhauls the End with many new areas to explore, bosses to fight and rewards to gain.

mod.name: OpenBlocks
mod.description: OpenBlocks is a random collection of ideas - ideas the community have suggested, or ideas we thought "Why hasn't anyone done that yet?". There is no theme, it's quite random. It's not even just blocks, as the name suggests!

mod.name: Pam's Harvestcraft
mod.description: Expanded food system including tons of new crops!

mod.name: Random Things
mod.description: A compilation of different blocks and items.

mod.name: NEI Addons
mod.description: Adds in mod integration into NEI by showing bee breeding information as well as other helpful mod plugins.

mod.name: NEI Integration
mod.description: Replaces NEI Plugins

mod.name: Not Enough Items
mod.description: Allows you to quickly and easily look up recipes and uses for any item in Minecraft included modded items. Also allows easy spawning of items and a range of one click utilities.

mod.name: Thaumic Inventory Scanning
mod.description: Allows hovering over items in inventories while holding a Thaumometer to scan them.

mod.name: Waila
mod.description: WAILA (What Am I Looking At) is a mod that shows you what you are looking at.

mod.name: WailaPlugins
mod.description: Addon for waila

mod.name: Beyond Reality Core
mod.description: Added features for the Beyond Reality ModPack

mod.name: GTTweaker
mod.description: Minetweaker Addon for GregTech 5.

mod.name: MineTweaker 3
mod.description: Customize your minecraft experience!

mod.name: ModTweaker
mod.description: ModTweaker is an addon for MineTweaker 3.

mod.name: Applied Energistics 2
mod.description: Applied Energistics 2 is a Minecraft Mod which contains a large amount of new content, mostly centered around the concept of using Energy, and the Transformation of Energy in a unique way.

mod.name: Computronics
mod.description: Computronics is a Minecraft mod that adds a set of computer peripherals

mod.name: Enhanced Portals 3
mod.description: An advanced technological portal teleportation system

mod.name: ExtraCells2
mod.description: A Mod that adds 4 new ME Storage Cells and some other cool stuff to AE.

mod.name: Factorization
mod.description: Auto-crafting, ore processing, barrels, and other toys

mod.name: Framez
mod.description: Now you're thinking with frames!

mod.name: Iron Chest Minecarts
mod.description: Iron chest inside minecrafts !

mod.name: Iron Chests 2
mod.description: Tiered chest from iron to diamond with different sizes

mod.name: JABBA
mod.description: Just Another Better Barrel Attempt

mod.name: Logistics Pipes
mod.description: Logistics Pipes is an extensive overhaul of the Buildcraft pipe system. It allows for better distribution of items via pipes, more organised stockkeeping and easier automated crafting.

mod.name: Nuclear Control 2
mod.description: It gives players the ability to build efficient monitoring and control systems for Industrial Craft Nuclear Reactors. Items in IC2 Nuclear Control can monitor temperature and conditions of the reactor (as well as other IC2 objects) and respond accordingly, whether by turning off the reactor, or by setting off a Howler Alarm to warn nearby players of their impending doom.

mod.name: Open Computers
mod.description: This mod adds programmable, modular and persistent computers to the game.

mod.name: PneumaticCraft
mod.description: A technical mod all about pneumatics!

mod.name: Practical Logistics
mod.description: All things data - Requires SonarCore

mod.name: Pressure Pipes
mod.description: Pressurized Pipes and tanks

mod.name: Project Blue
mod.description: Additional blocks and items for Project Red.

mod.name: Project Red - Base
mod.description: Redstone. The way it was meant to be. Built against Forge 10.13.3.1399-1.7.10. Supporters: Jacob M

mod.name: Project Red - Compat
mod.description: This mod gives you the tools you need to push redstone to its true potential.

mod.name: Project Red - Integration
mod.description: This mod gives you the tools you need to push redstone to its true potential.

mod.name: Project Red - Lighting
mod.description: This mod gives you the tools you need to push redstone to its true potential.

mod.name: Project Red - World
mod.description: This mod gives you the tools you need to push redstone to its true potential.

mod.name: Railcraft
mod.description: Redefine your rails

mod.name: Remain In Motion
mod.description: A reimplementation of Redpower frames, with more flexibility and functionality, and including many new types of frames.

mod.name: Router Reborn
mod.description: Bringing the router back in 1.7.x

mod.name: Steve's Factory Manager
mod.description: This mod allows you to move items between different inventories (machines and storage blocks) by specifying it using commands in a flow chart like way.

mod.name: StevesAddons
mod.description: Fixes issues with SFM

mod.name: Storage Drawers
mod.description: Multi-drawer storage blocks for quick storage and retrieval.

mod.name: Storage Drawers: Forestry Pack
mod.description: Adds additional wood styles from the Forestry mod.

mod.name: Storage Drawers: Misc Pack
mod.description: Adds additional wood styles from various mods including ExtraBiomesXL, Highlands, Thaumcraft, and Witchery.

mod.name: Super Crafting Frame
mod.description: Super Crafting Frame is a simple mod that helps with repetitive crafting tasks during early game.

mod.name: AutoMagy
mod.description: Golems Logistic's Together with quaility of life additions to thaumcraft = Sweet!

mod.name: Forbidden Magic
mod.description: Forbidden Magic is an addon to add many dark-themed things to Thaumcraft.

mod.name: Gadomancy
mod.description: An addon for Thaumcraft.

mod.name: Tainted Magic
mod.description: An intercrete addon to Thaumcraft 4 that elaborates the darker nuances of Thaumaturgy.

mod.name: TCBotaniaExoflame
mod.description: Botania Exoflame support for Thaumcraft's Alchemical Furnace!

mod.name: Thaumcraft
mod.description: This is what this mod is all about - drawing magic from physical objects in the form of Essentia and reshaping it to perform miracles.

mod.name: Thaumcraft Gates
mod.description: Adds thaumcraft gates to buildcraft

mod.name: Thaumic Energistics
mod.description: The digital age could use some magic

mod.name: Thaumic Exploration
mod.description: An add-on for Thaumcraft 4.1, adding a variety of content.

mod.name: Thaumic Horizons
mod.description: Pushing the boundaries of magic

mod.name: Thaumic Tinkerer
mod.description: An addon to Thaumcraft 4, implementing new content. This mod is a spiritual successor to Elemental Tinkerer. Researches that come from this mod are prefixed by [TT]. Build 24.

mod.name: Traveller's Gear
mod.description: RPG Inventories! Armorstands! Cross-Mod Interaction! Woohoo!

mod.name: Witching Gadgets
mod.description: It's a kind of magic

mod.name: Botania
mod.description: Botania is a magic tech mod based on nature.

mod.name: Forestry for Minecraft
mod.description: Trees, bees and more.

mod.name: Advanced Solar Panels
mod.description: Advanced Solar Panels + Quantum Generator + Solar helmets

mod.name: Big Reactors
mod.description: Adds large, multiblock power generation machines to Minecraft. Compatible with Redstone Flux (RF) power. Special thanks: powercrystals, skyboy, King_Lemming, & Calclavia for example code.

mod.name: Buildcraft
mod.description: Extending Minecraft with pipes, auto-crafting, quarries, engines and much more!

mod.name: BuildCraft Compat
mod.description: Compatibility add-on for BuildCraft

mod.name: Compact Solars
mod.description: Compact your solars into a single block with just as much uhmp

mod.name: CompactWaterTurbines
mod.description: A IC2 addon that adds Compact Water Turbines

mod.name: Ender IO
mod.description: Compact conduits, painted things and access to your stuff through an eye of ender.

mod.name: Extra Utilities
mod.description: A collection of useful blocks and items

mod.name: Flood Lights
mod.description: Adds flood lights to Minecraft

mod.name: GraviSuiteReloaded
mod.description: Since Graviation Suite seems to be an abandoned project that is currently experiencing some bugs i'm working on my own version of it. For now you can take a look at some new things i'm adding.

mod.name: GregTech 5 Unofficial
mod.description: This Mod adds the awesome Technology of GregTech-Intergalactical to your World!

mod.name: GT++
mod.description: Adds a few various Multiblocks, Machines, etc to Gregtech and a plethora of other mods (Nearly 30!)

mod.name: IHL Tools & Machines
mod.description: IC2 addon for extended water physics, Sticky resin production branch, Industrial fan and much more

mod.name: Industrial Craft
mod.description: Industrial age themed expansion for Minecraft.

mod.name: MachineMuse's Modular Powersuits
mod.description: A mod which adds modular power armor, power tool, and a tinker table to configure them. Uses UniversalElectricty or IC2 for energy.

mod.name: MineFactory Reloaded
mod.description: Automate everything!

mod.name: Steve's Carts 2
mod.description: Steve's Carts 2 introduces a modular system where you can build a huge amount of carts(hundreds of millions) by combining the parts you want.

mod.name: Steve's Workshop
mod.description: This mod adds a production table that contains multiple modular crafting tables and/or furnaces.

mod.name: AromaBackup
mod.description: This is a small Backup mod I created. All it does: Backups. It also works on clients!

mod.name: DiscordIntegration
mod.description: Minecraft <=> Discord integration

mod.name: EiraIrc
mod.description: This is an IRC connector that works on both client and server independently. It also adds some neat features like name colors, aliases and supports private IRC messages as well as Twitch chat. It also allows you to upload screenshots immediately to either DirectUpload or imgur!

mod.name: Forge Auto-Shutdown
mod.description: Automatically shuts down the server by schedule, or by player vote.

mod.name: Forge Essentials
mod.description: A suite of server mods for Minecraft Forge

mod.name: Forge Essentials Client Addon
mod.description: Client addon for ForgeEssentials (optional)

mod.name: Opis
mod.description: Opis is a server profiler for Forge server. (Includes Map Writer)

mod.name: TickProfiler
mod.description: Coremod/API for transforming classes using config files.

mod.name: BiblioWoods Biomes O'Plenty Edition
mod.description: Adds support for 16 varietys of wood from Biomes O'Plenty for 8 of the wooden block in BiblioCraft.

mod.name: BiblioWoods Highlands Edition
mod.description: Adds support for 4 varietys of wood from Highlands for 8 of the wooden block in BiblioCraft.

mod.name: FastCraft
mod.description: FastCraft optimizes MineCraft in various ways, visit the homepage for further details and support.

mod.name: ReAuth
mod.description: A Mod to renew your Session

mod.name: SkinPort
mod.description: This mod adds rendering support for the new skin format introduced in minecraft 1.8

mod.name: Squidless
mod.description: Reduces Squid spawning

mod.name: TcpNoDelayMod
mod.description: TcpNoDelayMod improves the client's network connection by disabling Nagle's algorithm. This mod has no effect on Minecraft version 1.8.1 and newer, as Mojang has already made the same modification.

mod.name: DeathCounter
mod.description: Simple death counter for servers. This mod adds a way for the server to calculate the number of deaths a player has (since its installation). It will also notify the player of the death count and ranking on the server

mod.name: Doomlike Dungeons
mod.description: Algorithmically generates multiroom dungeons resembling Doom levels into the world.

mod.name: Hat Stand
mod.description: Addon for Hats, a Hat Stand block to display hats.

mod.name: Morpheus
mod.description: Morpheus is a server-only mod that adds sleep voting to a forge based server.

mod.name: The Twilight Forest
mod.description: An enchanted forest dimension.

mod.name: AppleCore
mod.description: In BR this only serves as a client-side mod. It allows the user to see more detailed information on anything invloving hunger.

mod.name: ArmorStatusHUD
mod.description: Provides a HUD with your equipped armor/item stats.

mod.name: Damage Indicators
mod.description: Displays the damage you inflict on creatures, as well as current health, name and potion effects.

mod.name: IC2 Backpack HUD
mod.description: Provides visual charge meter for Industrial Craft electric armor items and health meter for other items.

mod.name: Inventory Tweaks
mod.description: Tweaks to inventory handling for ease of use, including sorting and automatic replacement of broken tools or exhausted stacks of items.

mod.name: JourneyMap
mod.description: JourneyMap Unlimited Edition: Real-time map in-game or in a web browser as you explore.

mod.name: TC Node Tracker
mod.description: Tracks scanned nodes for Thaumcraft

mod.name: Thaumcraft Nei Plugin
mod.description: Nei Plugin for thaumcraft

mod.name: TrashSlot
mod.description: Adds a trash slot to the inventory screen that allows deletion of unwanted items.

mod.name: EvilCraft
mod.description: An evil mod for Minecraft.

mod.name: In-Game NBTEdit
mod.description: This mod allows opped users to edit nbt tags in game - modify both regular entities and tile entities without even closing your game!

mod.name: WorldEdit
mod.description: WorldEdit is an easy-to-use in-game world editor for Minecraft, supporting both single player and multiplayer.

mod.name: WorldEditCUI
mod.description: A graphical user interface for WorldEdit. WorldEditCUI is designed to assist in using WorldEdit, as well as preventing accidental errors.

mod.name: Biomes O' Plenty
mod.description: Adds 87 new, unique biomes!

mod.name: Highlands
mod.description: Highlands is a mod that adds more biomes to Minecraft. Over 40 new biomes, new trees, giant mountains, and biome-specific ore gen.

mod.name: Hats - Files
mod.description: Adds a bunch of hats, as wells as the ability to add more, into Minecraft

mod.name: HEE Music
mod.description: The resource pack contains 10 music tracks composed by qwertygiy, which play during various events in the End dimension, and can also be found as Music Discs in loot chests in the End. Hardcore Ender Expansion is required for the resource pack to work.

mod.name: Pyrolusite's GregTech Alternate Textures
mod.description: Alternate gregtech textures!

mod.name: Soartex Fanver Resource Pack
mod.description: Soartex Fanver Resource Pack for Beyond Reality

mod.name: Aroma1997Core
mod.description: This is basically a library used by most my other mods.

mod.name: AsieLib
mod.description: Library for Asie mods

mod.name: Baubles
mod.description: Baubles is a small addon mod and api that is intended to be used by other mods to add additional inventory slots to a character

mod.name: BdLib
mod.description: This is a collection of generic code used by bdew's other mods

mod.name: CodeChickenCore
mod.description: Core library for all ChickenBones mods

mod.name: CodeChickenLib
mod.description: Needed for ChickenBones mods

mod.name: CoFH Core
mod.description: Framework required for all Team CoFH mods.

mod.name: Commons-code
mod.description: Core File

mod.name: commons-compress
mod.description: Core File

mod.name: ejml
mod.authors: Alblaka, Player, RichardG, Thunderdark, GregoriusT, alexthesax, Drashian, Elementalist, Feanturi, Lurch1985, SirusKing, tahu44
mod.description: Lib for IC2

mod.name: EnderCore
mod.description: Library mod used by EnderIO, EnderZoo, and others

mod.name: iChunUtil
mod.description: Shared library mod required by several of iChun's Mods.

mod.name: Liteloader
mod.description: LiteLoader is a lightweight mod loader for Minecraft designed to provide simple, high-performance and reliable loader functionality for mods which don't need to modify game mechanics.

mod.name: Mantle
mod.description: Tinkers Construct Library

mod.name: Micdoodle8 Core
mod.description: Provides core features of Micdoodle8's mods

mod.name: MobiusCore
mod.description: Core mod used for Opis

mod.name: Numina
mod.description: A common library of useful functions and utilities for dealing with Minecraft's source code.

mod.name: OpenMods Lib
mod.description: This is required for all of OpenBlocks mods.

mod.name: PlanetguyLib
mod.description: Lib for remain In Motion

mod.name: Player API
mod.description: Player API gives third party mods managed access to the main player class

mod.name: Slick-Util
mod.description: Slick-Util is a small library to enable you to load various image, sound and font formats for use with LWJGL.

mod.name: SonarCore
mod.description: Sonar's Modding Framework

mod.name: Vorbis-Java-Core
mod.description: Needed For MPS

mod.name: Forge MultiPart
mod.description: Open source library for facilitation of multiple functional parts in the one block space.

mod.name: In-Game wiki Mod
mod.description: Mod that allows for mods to add in-game documentation.

mod.name: MalisisCore
mod.description: Core for Malisis mods

mod.name: Trajectory
mod.description: Trajectory is a mod/API that allows other mods to move blocks around the world following certain trajectories. Those trajectories can either be the pre-defined ones (translation and rotation), or custom ones created by implementing the ITrajectory interface.

mod.name: MrTJPCore
mod.description: Core for Project Red

mod.name: Galacticraft Planets
mod.description: Mars addon for Galacticraft.

mod.name: GalacticraftCore
mod.description: Blast off to the stars. Makes a space base or a space station. Discover new worlds and exicting dungeons.

mod.name: Hats
mod.description: Adds a bunch of hats, as wells as the ability to add more, into Minecraft

mod.name: bspkrsCore
mod.description: Shared classes used in the mods maintained by bspkrs.
